p: Tunesian sheep pestiviruses strains Aydin/04 and Burdur/05, among ruminants discovered through next generation sequencing in Turkey, have been linked to have a close relation with classical swine fever virus ( Becher et al., 2012). New variants of bluetongue virus have also been reported through metagenomics. A novel boca parvovirus 6 has been documented. Similarly, novel astroviruses have been detected in domestic sheep with nonsuppurative encephalitis and ganglionitis ( Pfaff et al., 2017), and one was discovered serendipitously in feces of sheep in Hungary ( Reuter et al., 2012).
